basic.description: This course is open to advanced undergraduates with consent of instructor. The physical setting and community organization of these habitats are presented through lectures and substantial readings: rocky intertidal, sand beach, subtidal soft bottom, coral reef, deep-sea habitats.
basic.subject: OCB
basic.title: Marine Benthic Ecology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: ZOO 4203C. College level statistics recommended.
